thread.title: Ross drops 31 as San Miguel overpowers TNT, evens series
thread.title_full: Ross drops 31 as San Miguel overpowers TNT, evens series

author: Jane Bracher
title: Ross drops 31 as San Miguel overpowers TNT, evens series
text:
PBA Ross drops 31 as San Miguel overpowers TNT, evens series San Miguel leads by as much as 22 points before settling for the 11-point victory, tying the series at 2-2 Published 9:09 PM, February 14, 2017 Updated 9:31 PM, February 14, 2017 BIG TIME. Chris Ross explodes for the Beermen as they even the best-of-7 series at 2-2. Photo by Czeasar Dancel/Rappler 
MANILA, Philippines (UPDATED) â€“ Chris Ross exploded for a career-high 31 points and the San Miguel Beermen built a big enough lead to fend off TNT KaTropa, 97-86, to even   semifinals at 2-2 on Tuesday, February 14 at the Mall of Asia Arena. 
The defending champions avoided a 3-1 deficit after losing back-to-back to TNT, which relied on its ample bench contribution to pull through. 
Ross made 5 of his 11 triple attempts and also pulled down 5 rebounds and dished out 5 assists. 
June Mar Fajardo posted 15 points and 15 rebounds plus 4 blocks, as Alex Cabagnot dropped 12 markers. 
Marcio Lassiter had a double-double of 12 points and 10 assists on top of 6 rebounds, while Arwind Santos added 7 points and 8 rebounds. Gabby Espinas chipped in 10 markers. 
San Miguel pulled away from a close game in the second quarter, outscoring TNT by 26-13 and eventually led by as much as 22 points. The KaTropa managed to slice the deficit to 9 in the payoff period but were not able to get over the hump. 
Larry Fonacier came off the bench for a team-high 15 points as Jayson Castro had 13 markers and 5 assists. Mo Tautuaa registered 12 points and 6 rebounds as TNT's bench continued to dominate, 44-20. 
The KaTropa struggled with outside shooting, going 6-of-28 from deep. But capitalized on their time at the free throw line with 19-of-24 makes. TNT, on the other hand, was 8-of-12. 
Game 5 of this best-of-7 series is on Thursday, February 16. 
Scores : SMB (97) : Ross 31, Fajardo 15, Lassiter 12, Cabagnot 12, Espinas 10, Garcia 8, Santos 7, Tubid 2, Y. De Ocampo 0, Reyes 0, Heruela 0. TNT (86) : Fonacier 15, Castro 13, Tautuaa 12, Williams 10, Pogoy 9, Rosario 5, Ganuelas-Rosser 4, R. De Ocampo 4, Rosales 4, Carey 4, Reyes 4, Seigle 2, Sumalinog 0. Quarter scores : 18-19, 44-32, 76-58, 97-86.
